Ryan is currently a PhD student at the University of Michigan biostatistics department, where he just recently completed a masters. Prior to graduate school, he worked as a biostatistician for the University of Utah medical school and as a product specialist and data analyst for Qualtrics llc. Ryan has worked significantly with large medical claims datasets such as Medicare Part D and OptumInsight through various projects, ranging from opioid prescribing disparities to characterization of prostate cancer treatments. He plans on continuing into a career that focuses on population health research and related interventions.
